Our Ref  : CCC/RMS/451/1/Q20/4460310030064974                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                    
Date     : 31/10/22                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                    
MOHD SHAH                                                                                                                           
PEJABAT IMIGRESEN SANDAKAN                                                                                                          
W.D.T 53, TINGKAT 3, WISMA                                                                                                          
PERSEKUTUAN 90007 SANDAKAN                                                                                                          
SABAH                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                    
Dear Sir/Madam,                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                    
RE        : Cancellation Of Card : 4460310030064974                                                                                 
-----------------------------------------------------------------                                                                   
The recent teleconversation on the above matter refers. We are to                                                                   
advise that your credit card bearing the above card number has                                                                      
been cancelled on 31/10/22 due to suspected fraud and a                                                                             
replacement card will be issued.                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
In view thereof, we are to advise you of the followings:-                                                                           
                                                                                                                                    
1. Refrain  from  further  usage  of the above credit card as the                                                                   
   card  ( inclusive  of  supplementary,  if  any ), is  to  be                                                                     
   surrendered  to  the  nearest  Maybank  branch  duly  cut into                                                                   
   halves.                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                    
2. In  case of any dispute, please  complete and return to us the                                                                   
   enclosed  declaration  form  duly  signed. The  form  must  be                                                                   
   returned  to  us  at  the  address  printed  below  or  fax to                                                                   
   03-20709081, within 14  days  from  date  of  this  letter  to                                                                   
   facilitate our investigation.                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
Meanwhile, we will be transferring the outstanding balance in the                                                                   
above card to your new replacement card's account. This transfer                                                                    
of balance will be reflected in your next statement of account.                                                                     
                                                                                                                                    
Please effect payment on your genuine charges into your new                                                                         
replacement card's account in order to avoid accumulation of                                                                        
finance charges which is to be borne by cardholder(s). ONLY                                                                         
finance and late charges imposed on the unauthorised transactions                                                                   
will be reversed out by us.                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                    
We regret for any inconvenience caused. Should you need any                                                                         
further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact our                                                                           
Customer Service Representatives at 03-20787878 or fax to                                                                           
03-20709081 or e-mail to mbbcardservices@MAYbank.com.my.

advise that your credit card bearing the above card number has

   card  ( inclusive  of  supplementary,  if  any ), is  to  be                                                                     
   surrendered  to  the  nearest  Maybank  branch  duly  cut into                                                                   
   halves.

   enclosed  declaration  form  duly  signed. The  form  must  be                                                                   
   returned  to  us  at  the  address  printed  below  or  fax to                                                                   
   03-20709081, within 14  days  from  date  of  this  letter  to                                                                   
   facilitate our investigation.                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
Meanwhile, we will be transferring the outstanding balance in the                                                                   
above card to your new replacement card's account. This transfer                                                                    
of balance will be reflected in your next statement of account.

replacement card's account in order to avoid accumulation of                                                                        
finance charges which is to be borne by cardholder(s). ONLY                                                                         
finance and late charges imposed on the unauthorised transactions

RE        : Cancellation Of Card : 5460150031900793                                                                                 
-----------------------------------------------------------------                                                                   
The recent teleconversation on the above matter refers. We are to                                                                   
advise that your credit card bearing the above card number has                                                                      
been cancelled on 31/10/22 due to suspected fraud and a                                                                             
replacement card will be issued.                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
In view thereof, we are to advise you of the followings:-                                                                           
                                                                                                                                    
1. Refrain  from  further  usage  of the above credit card as the                                                                   
   card  ( inclusive  of  supplementary,  if  any ), is  to  be                                                                     
   surrendered  to  the  nearest  Maybank  branch  duly  cut into                                                                   
   halves.                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                    
2. In  case of any dispute, please  complete and return to us the                                                                   
   enclosed  declaration  form  duly  signed. The  form  must  be                                                                   
   returned  to  us  at  the  address  printed  below  or  fax to                                                                   
   03-20709081, within 14  days  from  date  of  this  letter  to                                                                   
   facilitate our investigation.                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
Meanwhile, we will be transferring the outstanding balance in the                                                                   
above card to your new replacement card's account. This transfer                                                                    
of balance will be reflected in your next statement of account.                                                                     
                                                                                                                                    
Please effect payment on your genuine charges into your new                                                                         
replacement card's account in order to avoid accumulation of                                                                        
finance charges which is to be borne by cardholder(s). ONLY                                                                         
finance and late charges imposed on the unauthorised transactions                                                                   
will be reversed out by us.                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                    
We regret for any inconvenience caused. Should you need any                                                                         
further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact our                                                                           
Customer Service Representatives at 03-20787878 or fax to                                                                           
03-20709081 or e-mail to mbbcardservices@MAYbank.com.my.

   facilitate our investigation.                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
Meanwhile, we will be transferring the outstanding balance in the                                                                   
above card to your new replacement card's account. This transfer                                                                    
of balance will be reflected in your next statement of account.                                                                     
                                                                                                                                    
Please effect payment on your genuine charges into your new                                                                         
replacement card's account in order to avoid accumulation of                                                                        
finance charges which is to be borne by cardholder(s). ONLY                                                                         
finance and late charges imposed on the unauthorised transactions                                                                   
will be reversed out by us.                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                    
We regret for any inconvenience caused. Should you need any                                                                         
further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact our                                                                           
Customer Service Representatives at 03-20787878 or fax to                                                                           
03-20709081 or e-mail to mbbcardservices@MAYbank.com.my.

We refer to the above account.

remains overdue.                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
Please take note that we would be compelled to cancel Personal                                                                      
Financing-I account and proceed with further recovery action                                                                        
including tagging and/or setting-off your banking(s) with Maybank                                                                   
(if any), assign your account to our appointed Debt Collection                                                                      
Agency and/or to proceed with further legal action to recover the                                                                   
above amount.                                                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                    
In order to avoid any inconvenience or adverse record, we would                                                                     
appreciate if you could kindly effect the full minimum payment to                                                                   
us within 5 days from this letter.                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                    
If payment has been made, please accept our thanks and kindly                                                                       
ignore this reminder. Please contact us at 03-2070 8833 EXT 4059                                                                    
or 2833 once you have made full settlement or if further                                                                            
clarification is required.                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                    
Meanwhile, Bank Negara Malaysia has established Agensi Kaunseling                                                                   
dan Pengurusan Kredit (AKPK) to provide services on money                                                                           
management, credit counselling, financial education and debt                                                                        
restructuring for individuals. For enquiry, please call                                                                             
03-2616 7766.                                                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                    
Thank you.
